_id.title: Identifier
_id.description: A unique identifier for the record.

opportunityName.title: Opportunity Name
opportunityName.description: Subject or descriptive name, such as the expected order or company name, for the opportunity.

opportunityDescription.title: Opportunity Description
opportunityDescription.description: Additional information to describe the opportunity, such as possible products to sell or past purchases from the customer.

opportunityType.title: Opportunity Type
opportunityType.description: Opportunity type such as Existing Business or New Business

opportunityStage.title: Opportunity Stage
opportunityStage.description: Sales stage of this opportunity to aid the sales team in their efforts to win this opportunity.

accountID.title: Account ID
accountID.description: Account unique identifier reference that this opportunity is linked to.

fiscalYear.title: Fiscal Year
fiscalYear.description: The fiscal year this opportunity is targeted.

fiscalQuarter.title: Fiscal Quarter
fiscalQuarter.description: The fiscal quarter this opportunity is targeted.

forecastCategory.title: Forecast Category
forecastCategory.description: Forecast Category determined by the opportunity Stage value eg: omitted,pipeline,bestcase,commit,closed.

forecastCategoryName.title: Forecast Category Name
forecastCategoryName.description: Forecast category name that is displayed in reports for a perticular forecast category.

isClosed.title: Closed Flag
isClosed.description: Flag indicating if this opportunity is closed.

isWon.title: Won Flag
isWon.description: Flag indicating if this opportunity is Won.

probabilityPercentage.title: Probability Percentage
probabilityPercentage.description: Likelihood that opportunity will close, stated as a percentage.

expectedRevenue.title: Expected Revenue
expectedRevenue.description: Calculated revenue based on the Amount and Probability.

opportunityQuantity.title: Opportunity Quantity
opportunityQuantity.description: Total of all quantity field values for all products in the Products related list for this opportunity.

expectedCloseDate.title: Expected Close Date
expectedCloseDate.description: Expected date of closure for this opportunity.

actualCloseDate.title: Actual Close Date
actualCloseDate.description: Actual date of closure for this opportunity.

lastActivityDate.title: Last Activity Date
lastActivityDate.description: Last activity date for this opportunity.

leadSource.title: Lead Source
leadSource.description: Source of the opportunity such as Advertisement, Partner, or Web.

nextStep.title: Next Step
nextStep.description: Description of next task in closing opportunity.
